title: Can't create a new discussion on other section, level not updated
body:
But I've heard that making a post would re-sync the level, so I'll give it a try here... 

It'll be nice if there's a button or something to the refresh the level though, haha.

replies.body: It can take a moment for your account to sync up to the boards.  Everything looks okay to post now!  We don't have a force sync on the boards, it should really do it on it's own, but it's a good idea.  Thanks for sharing!
